Jillion 5.3-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
org.jcvi
Jillion is a library used at the J. Craig Venter Institute to analyze and manipulate Genomic Sequence Data.
org.jcvi.jillion.align
This package contains classes used to create or parse alignments.
org.jcvi.jillion.align.exonerate  
org.jcvi.jillion.align.exonerate.vulgar  
org.jcvi.jillion.align.pairwise
This package contains classes for performing pair-wise alignments of two sequences.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca
This package contains objects for working with Celera Assembler input and output.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.frg  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas
This package contains classes for handling contigs stored in CLC Bio's .cas file format.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.consed  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.read  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.transform  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed
This package contains classes for working with Consed.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.nav  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd
This package contains classes for working with Consed Phd files.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.transform  
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr
This package contains objects for working with genomic assembly data using software written at The Institute for Genomic Research (TIGR).
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util
The Assembly util package contains utility classes that are useful for working with general assembly data regardless of what assembler was used or file format the data is in.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus
The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.slice
This package contains classes for working with slices.
org.jcvi.jillion.core
The Jillion Core package contains common genomic objects that are useful to all genomic investigations.
org.jcvi.jillion.core.datastore
The DataStore package deals with classes that represent a repository of entities.
org.jcvi.jillion.core.io
Utility package containing I/O related helper classes.
org.jcvi.jillion.core.pos  
org.jcvi.jillion.core.qual
This package deals with genomic quality data such as phred quality scores.
org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue  
org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.aa  
org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt  
org.jcvi.jillion.core.util
Contains common utility classes.
org.jcvi.jillion.core.util.iter  
org.jcvi.jillion.core.util.streams  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align.blast  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align.blast.btab
This package handles writing Btab format.
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.assembly.agp  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.ncbi.submit.assemblyArchive  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.plate  
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.primer
This module deals with working with sequencing primers.
org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.trace.archive2  
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta
This package contains classes for dealing with fasta data.
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.aa
This package deals with Fasta files that contain ProteinSequence data.
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt
This package deals with Fasta files that contain NucleotideSequence data.
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.pos  
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.qual
This package deals with Fasta files that contain QualitySequence data.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal
The internal package and subpackages contain classes that only intended to be used by Jillion itself and not used by external code.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.align  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.datastore  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.residue  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.seq.trace.sanger.chromat.ztr.data  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.util  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.util.iter  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.aa  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.nt  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.qual  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam
Internal package for working with SAM data.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam.index
Internal package for working with Bam indexes.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.abi  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.abi.tag  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.abi.tag.rate  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf.header
An SCF Header is a 128 byte record that describes the location and size of the different Sections.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf.header.pos
To keep the file size down, SCF Files can store their Chromatogram Positions as either a byte or as a short; this package uses the strategy pattern to encapsulate the implementation.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf.section
An SCF file is divided into several sections; each section contains only certain fields of a Chromatogram.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr  
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.chunk
The chunk package implements all the possible Chunk formats in the ZTR 1.2 specification.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.data
The data package contains all the classes needed to decode the different data formats in the ZTR specification.
org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.fastq  
org.jcvi.jillion.maq
This package allows Jillion to read and write data files used by the "Mapping and Assembly with Qualities" (Maq) software.
org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfa
This package supports reading and writing Maq's Binary Fasta File format .bfa.
org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfq
This package supports reading and writing Maq's Binary Fastq File format .bfq.
org.jcvi.jillion.orf  
org.jcvi.jillion.profile
This package works with ANDES profile files.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam
This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.attribute
This package deals with Sam Attributes for an individual "Sam Segment" record.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.cigar
This package contains classes for working with CIGAR alignment format.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header
This package contains classes for working with Sam and Bam header information.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.index
This package contains classes for working with BAM indexes.
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform
This package transforms SAM encoded files into other assembly "contexts" using AssemblyTransformer.
org.jcvi.jillion.shared
Classes and packages that are meant to be internal to Jillion classes but need to be public so several different Jillion packages can use them.
org.jcvi.jillion.shared.fasta
Common classes that are used the different types of Fasta (nucleotide fasta, protein fasta etc) but aren't meant to be used by Jillion users.
org.jcvi.jillion.testutils  
org.jcvi.jillion.testutils.assembly.cas
Utility classes for testing CLC Reference Assembled data CAS formatted data.
org.jcvi.jillion.trace  
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat
This package and its sub packages deal with Sanger Chromatogram object and file representations.
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.abi
This package can decode Applied Biosystems AB1 formatted trace files into org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sanger.chromat.Chromatogram objects.
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.abi.tag  
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.abi.tag.rate  
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.scf
The SCF package can encode and decode Chromatograms in SCF format first described in Dear, S and Staden, R. "A standard file format for data from DNA sequencing instruments", DNA Sequence 3, 107-110, (1992).
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.ztr
ZTR Format can store sanger trace data more efficiently than the SCFv3 format.
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq
This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.
org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sff
This package contains classes for working with 454 or Ion Torrent sff encoded files.
org.jcvi.jillion.trim  
org.jcvi.jillion.trim.lucy
This package contains trimmer implementations that follow the algorithms used by the TIGR program LUCY that was used to trim sanger reads.
org.jcvi.jillion.trim.trimmomatic
This package contains trimmer implementations based on the popular Trimmomatic program.
